name: Proxy Quest
description:
X-Blades, the space pirates that conquered almost every planet in the galaxy, are almost at the doorstep of our planet. To defend this last bastion of humanity, you were sent on a suicide mission. Your goal is simple - take the mysterious cargo from one of X-Blades commanders. According to your sources, if you can get this wea&@$* [ERROR:RESTART]


Proxy Quest is your roguelike experience, heavly inspired by Enter the Gungeon, Steredenn, Monolith, and many others with very minimalist pixel art graphics. Start your run, grabs some upgrades for your ship, shot your enemies, avoid hundred of bullets and take down the entire X-Blades fleet. 

And remember - your main quest must be done!

  • 9 different ships to choose
  • 200+ upgrades to find, to help with your Quest
  • 1000+ handcrafted levels layouts
  • 70+ enemies to meet on your way
  • 20 bosses to fight
  • Experience system that enables you to create the best possible run
  • 6 extra challenges
  • Multiple of secrets to find
  • Full controller support
  • High-Score table for your best and quickest run
  • [SYSTEM READY FOR RESTAT: ENTERING MAIN LOOP]
